column5: I am going fishing at Thistle lake just south of Tomogamy Ontario and wonder if anyone has fished here before and can give me some advice, mostly interested in Walleye. Thanks

If you have not gone yet fish near the big Island in the middle of the lake. Focus on the large rock point on the south side. Fish in about 10-15 feet of water for this time of year. A local from the lake.
